dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.product.offer.SimpleProductOffering
dataStructure.description:
A type of ProductOffering that does not have any subordinate ProductOfferings, that is, an SimpleProductOffering is a leaf-level ProductOffering.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SimpleProductOffering

child.name: productSpecification2
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ProdSpecMadeAvailableAsSimpleProdOffer

This association end is optional
child.label: productSpecification2

child.name: productComponent
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association SimpleProdOfferInstantiatedAs

This association end is optional
child.label: productComponent
